alert.note: Alert for Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 16 at 4:31PM EDT until August 16 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 330 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Eglin Air Force Base to 11 miles northwest of Panama City Beach, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Santa Rosa Beach, Eglin Air Force Base, Freeport, Inlet Beach, Portland, Port Washington, Blue Mountain Beach, Seaside, Gulf Pines, New Home, Bunker, Grayton Beach, Seagrove Beach, Sandestin and Four Mile Village. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
